title: ALL SOLD!!! IT'S SAD TO SEE THEM GO!!! 1 card left! REDUCED!!

posts.post_title: ALL SOLD!!! IT'S SAD TO SEE THEM GO!!! 1 card left! REDUCED!!
posts.post_content:
ALL CARDS ARE SOLD! Thank You one & all!



REULBACH SOLD

CHASE, SHAW, OLDRING SOLD

3-9: LUMLEY & STONE ARE AVAILABLE!
  
 3-9 STONE SOLD
    

3-9: LUMLEY REDUCED FOR FINAL SALE! $65 DELIVERED!


This is it! My LAST 6 cards from the Roy Mellinger Collection that I have been selling for several months. I'm very sad to see such a nice collection go!

See this old thread for some interesting provenance! N54 thread re: 
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=118774&highlight=t206[/url]

NEW LOW PRICES! (PayPal F&F, MO, Pers Ck)

SOLD (1)T206 HARRY LUMLEY PORTRAIT-SC150/30 SGC 40 VG 3!

Here is a BRILLIANT EXAMPLE of the PORTRAIT HARRY LUMLEY, outfielder for the BROOKLYN SUPERBAS.  It sports the Sweet Cap 150/30 label w/ RICH DARK COLORS & a WELL-CENTERED picture. LARGE WHITE BORDERS & VERY CLEAN F & B-- A HIGH QUALITY T206, TO BE SURE! $69 DELIVERED!

SOLD(2) T206 HAL CHASE WHITE CAP-P150/25 SGC 30 GOOD 2! 

Here's an WONDERFUL EXAMPLE of HAL CHASE, 1st Baseman for the NEW YORK HIGHLANDERS (YANKEES). CENTERING a bit toward the top-the BORDERS are NICE & WHITE & CORNERS WELL-DEFINED. Picture COLOR & CONTRAST is BRIGHT & CRYSTAL CLEAR while BOTH F & B are virtually SPOT FREE & CRISPY CLEAN! One of the most popular T206 PLAYERS to collect! $89 DELIVERED!

SOLD(3) GEORGE STONE PORTRAIT SC150/30 SGC 40 VG 3!

An EXQUISITE example w/ GORGEOUS COLOR & CONTRAST--EYE APPEAL 2nd to NONE! PURE WHITE BORDERS & NR PERFECT CENTERING! SPOTLESS w/ all the qualities of a 6 or 7! $84 DELIVERED

SOLD (4) ED REULBACH GLOVE SHOWING P150/25 SGC 40 VG 3!

A TREMENDOUS example w/ DEEP RICH COLOR & ULTRA-CLEAR CONTRAST! SNOW WHITE BORDERS w/ virtually SPOTLESS F & B--WELL-DEFINED CORNERS & WELL CENTERED! A PREMIER T206! $89 DELIVERED

SOLD(5) T206 AL SHAW-STL CARDINALS SWEETCAP 150/30 SGC 40 VG 3!

Here's an OUTSTANDING EXAMPLE of AL SHAW, outfielder for the ST LOUIS CARDINALS. EYE APPEAL is 2nd to NONE, for sure! LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & NICE SQUARED CORNERS are evident, along w/ a BEAUTIFULLY COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS. SPOTLESS F & B--AN OVERALL WONDERFUL T206! $49 DELIVERED

SOLD(6) T206 RUBE OLDRING-PHIL A’S P150/25 SGC 40 VG 3!

Here is a SUPERIOR EXAMPLE of RUBE OLDRING, outfielder for the PHILADELPHIA A'S. VIRTUALLY SPOTLESS F & B, w/ LARGE PURE WHITE BORDERS & NICE SHARP CORNERS. Features a very COLORFUL picture in FULL, CLEAR FOCUS w/ COLOR CONTRAST 2ND to NONE! A HIGH QUALITY T206, TO BE SURE! $49 DELIVERED


Thanks for looking--You won't be disappointed w/ ANY of these 6 BEAUTIES!!

Just PM/EM me ---1st come, 1st served! 

Fred

Chase/Shaw/Rube here...

Thank you


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
This Lumley may be the BEST LOOKING card of all! Who wants the LAST CARD left from the Mellinger Collection?
